headline: This Amazon Competitor Is Starting To Flare Up Following A Muted 2025: Momentum Score Surges
summary: Amazon.com Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN) rival Etsy Inc. (NYSE:ETSY) is beginning to stir after being dormant for an extended period of time, and this is already showing up in its Momentum score. Shares of the vintage e-commerce website were up just 4.39% last year, and have largely lagged against peers and benchmarks over the past couple of years. headline: Warren Buffett's New Year Financial Advice: 'Do Not Save What Is Left After Spending, But Spend What Is Left After Saving'
summary: Investment maestro Warren Buffett imparted his prime financial counsel for the middle class, underscoring the significance of saving prior to spending. Buffett’s financial acumen is anchored in a modest lifestyle and is designed to aid the middle class in attaining financial steadiness and enduring security. headline: AI-driven inflation is 2026's most overlooked risk, investors say
summary: Global stock markets, riding high on AI euphoria at the start of 2026 may be disregarding one of the biggest threats that could spoil the party: a surge in inflation driven partly by the tech investment boom.  U.S. stock indexes, where seven tech groups ​contributed half of all market earnings this year, made double-digit gains in 2025 to hit record highs as exuberance about AI and monetary easing also propelled European and ‌Asian equities to record peaks.  Expectations for further rate cuts have buoyed bonds too, handing U.S. Treasury investors the best annual performance for five years as inflation retreated, although it remains above the Federal Reserve's average 2% target.

content.title: AI-driven inflation is 2026's most overlooked risk, investors say
content.summary: Global stock markets, riding high on AI euphoria at the start of 2026 may be disregarding one of the biggest threats that could spoil the party: a surge in inflation driven partly by the tech investment boom.  U.S. stock indexes, where seven tech groups ​contributed half of all market earnings this year, made double-digit gains in 2025 to hit record highs as exuberance about AI and monetary easing also propelled European and ‌Asian equities to record peaks.  Expectations for further rate cuts have buoyed bonds too, handing U.S. Treasury investors the best annual performance for five years as inflation retreated, although it remains above the Federal Reserve's average 2% target.

headline: US Stocks Rise as Traders Shrug Off Maduro Ouster: Markets Wrap
summary: The Nasdaq 100 Index soared, with tech-focused megacaps such as Amazon.com Inc. and Meta Platforms among the gainers.  Chevron Corp. shares traded higher, alongside other US oil majors, after President Donald Trump floated plans for a US-led revival of Venezuela’s industry.  “While the capture of Venezuelan president Maduro by American forces has dominated headlines, financial markets seem unperturbed,” said Thomas Mathews, head of markets, Asia Pacific at Capital Economics.

content.title: US Stocks Rise as Traders Shrug Off Maduro Ouster: Markets Wrap
content.summary: The Nasdaq 100 Index soared, with tech-focused megacaps such as Amazon.com Inc. and Meta Platforms among the gainers.  Chevron Corp. shares traded higher, alongside other US oil majors, after President Donald Trump floated plans for a US-led revival of Venezuela’s industry.  “While the capture of Venezuelan president Maduro by American forces has dominated headlines, financial markets seem unperturbed,” said Thomas Mathews, head of markets, Asia Pacific at Capital Economics.
